title: "Startup Medicare Advantage insurer Alignment Healthcare goes public"
excerpt: "Alignment Healthcare offers an artificial-intelligence-enabled MA plan, and it ended 2020 with 68,323 members, growing 38.5% over 2019. The company launched in 2013 and has seen consistent double-digit membership growth, according to the SEC filings."
